snippet.title: Mathness Gameplay Trailer (2023)
snippet.description:
Why do educational games or learning games fail? Because they don't go far enough. Merely gluing education on to games or games on to education leaves us with shallow experiences. 

Once we start designing game mechanics alongside learning goals, we can create rich gaming and learning experiences. That's exactly how Mathness is designed. Our goal is to create the best educational game the world has seen: The trendsetter of educational games. 

Mathness is a story-driven adventure puzzle game with a mysterious world and a touch of mathematics. It offers the most exciting platform for practising and learning fractions and mathematical problem solving.

Become the Mathemagician! 

For more information: https://www.mathness.fi/
